traits.name: Land's Stride
traits.desc: Moving through nonmagical difficult terrain does not cost the heir extra movement.

traits.name: Natural Recovery (1/Day)
traits.desc: When the heir finishes a short rest, it can regain up to 3 total expended spell slots.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The heir is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The heir has the following druid spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): create bonfire, druidcraft, shillelagh, thorn whip * 1st level (4 slots): animal friendship, entangle, goodberry * 2nd level (3 slots): animal messenger, barkskin, beast sense, locate animals or plants, spider climb * 3rd level (3 slots): call lightning, plant growth, wind wall

traits.name: Wild Shape - Dire Wolf (2/Day)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the druid transforms into a dire wolf for up to three hours. When the wolf is reduced to 0 hit points, the druid reverts to its normal form, with any excess damage carrying over to the druid's hit points.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage or 5 (1d8 +1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
